pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Extra Care Normal Balance Leave In Treatment 150ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

The NORMAL BALANCE range for all hair types offers COMPLETE NOURISHMENT to keep hair looking healthy and full of shine.

Your hair requires a dose of nourishment to keep it looking healthy and full of shine.
EXTRA CARE NORMAL BALANCE offers:
+ DEEP NOURISHMENT WITHOUT OVERBURDENING
+ HEALTHY SHINE

Made In Australia
100% Recyclable via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for more details.

Suitable For: All Hair Types

Size: 150mL

Hair Type: All Hair Types

KEY FEATURES

• Deep Nourishment, Detangling & Healthy Shine
• 100% Recyclable via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for more details
• EXTRA CARE formulas with LIQUID KERATIN & ADVANCED HAIR
TECHNOLOGY help repair existing
damage and provide protection with visibly improved hair
quality.

Warnings

No

Ingredients

Aqua (Water, Eau) · Cyclomethicone · Dimethiconol · Hydroxyethylcellulose · Laureth-4 · Propylene Glycol · Quaternium-80 · Behenoyl PG-Trimonium Chloride · Methylparaben · Parfum (Fragrance) · Cocodimonium Hydroxypropyl · Hydrolyzed Keratin

Directions

After shampooing and conditioning, massage into towel-dried hair and comb through. USE ON: Dry or towel-dried hair. Leave in. Style as usual.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Tube & Cap are Kerbside Recyclable. Tube & Cap can also be recycled via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for details

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes

Recycling Code: 2 PEHD or HDPE
